How would you get the recessive allele in your population?
Using the Hardy-Weinberg Principle (p^2 + 2pq + q^2 = 1), how would you find p^2, the frequency of the AA genotype?
Using the Hardy-Weinberg Principle (p^2 + 2pq + q^2 = 1), how would you find pq, the frequency of the Aa genotype?
Using the Hardy-Weinberg Principle (p^2 + 2pq + q^2 = 1), how would you find q^2, the frequency of the aa genotype?
